description: Removes a table definition from the Data Catalog.  After completing this operation, you will no longer have access to the table versions and partitions that belong to the deleted table. AWS Glue deletes these 'orphaned' resources asynchronously in a timely manner, at the discretion of the service. To ensure immediate deletion of all related resources, before calling DeleteTable, use DeleteTableVersion or BatchDeleteTableVersion, and DeletePartition or BatchDeletePartition, to delete any resources that belong to the table.
